title: Current connection Error
body: So the current connection error problem has affected me twice today and on the second occasion for some reason I was not able to choose RETRY or CANCEL so the game i was supposed to be in was a remake and I got punished by the leaverbuster to 20 min. lower priority queue. I do not deserve to be in it. So if some developer out there could take a sec and somehow free me of this unjustifiable punishment I would really appreciate it.

replies.body:
I believe you're referencing the issue mentioned on the [**Service Status Page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na). If this is the case, and the workaround isn't working for you, then your issue is likely *unrelated* and is being caused by an issue along your route to the servers. I'd recommend checking our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for a list of steps that may resolve this issue entirely.

Let me know if you continue to see these issues after taking those steps.

That is what i was referencing to. And I see that it is being worked on but what do I do about this lower priority queue? I feel like i should not have to deal with five 20 min queue delays because of a client bug.

Unfortunately, a 5-game penalty is not a direct result of the known issue. In order to receive such a penalty, your account would have to exhibit a *recent trend* of disconnecting from games, and would have been influenced by other leaves on your account outside of this known issue. For integrity reasons, we're not able to remove or modify Leaverbuster penalties for any reason.

Let me know if you have any questions.
